110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Kelby,
Thanks for your reply and appreciate the compliment. We’ll be here when the time is right and you would like to chat.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: kelby hunter [mailto:khunt99@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, December 19, 2011 9:19 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Kelby
Steve,
I took a brief look at the website and will return when I have additional time. I think MBO has a good idea !!!!
KH On Mon, Dec 19, 2011 at 9:08 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Kelby,
I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
